title: Ruckmanism Ruckus - Geneha Kim
description:
When the name Peter Ruckman? is mentioned, what thoughts come to mind?
Throughout Baptist churches, this dangerous "cult" known as "Ruckmanism" has caused quite a ruckus that has alarmed many Christians. Fundamentalist churches and schools warn their people about him. Pastors reject anyone who is either a graduate of his school or connected to him in any way. Numerous books and websites are solely dedicated to attack this one man from Pensacola, Florida. Many believers around the world have heard strange things about him, but are they actually true? If so, why are there still thousands of Christians around the world (respected pastors, evangelists, and missionaries among them) who admire and want to learn from this man? Who exactly is Peter Ruckman?

This book attempts to thoroughly answer every major criticism about him and includes the following information:
-History of Fundamentalism and "Ruckmanism"
-Ruckman's "vulgar" language and character
-Ruckman's divorce and remarriage
-"Ruckmanites" before Ruckman
-Overview of manuscripts supporting the KJV
-Dispensational salvations
-Gap "theory" or "fact"? (Still a dumb theory)
-KJV correcting the "Hebrew" and "Greek"
-And many other "crazy" Ruckman teachings

About the author:
Gene Kim graduated with a B.D. and Th.M. from Pensacola Bible Institute. He is the pastor of King James Bible Baptist Church in Palm Springs, California
